TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataSourceDesigner extends System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner implements class System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner
Public Class DataSourceDesigner Inherits ControlDesigner Implements IDataSourceDesigner
type DataSourceDesigner = class inherit ControlDesigner interface IDataSourceDesigner

summary.span: 在设计主机中为 类提供设计时支持。

span.span: Provides design-time support in a design host for the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是数据源设计器的基类，如 、 和 类。The class is the base class for data source designers, such as the , , and classes. 如果创建新的数据源控件，则可能还需要为控件创建自定义控件设计器，并从类中派生该控件设计器 。If you create a new data source control, you might also want to create a custom control designer for your control and derive it from the class. 类具有两个事件方法： 和 方法。The class has two event methods: the and methods. 这两个事件都可以通过方法暂时禁用 ，这会设置 属性。Both of these events can be temporarily disabled with the method, which sets the property. 可以通过方法再次启用事件方法 。The event methods can be enabled again with the method. 可以使用两种静态方法来计算架构或视图的等效性，而无需创建类的实例：There are two static methods that you can use to evaluate the equivalency of schemas or views without creating an instance of the class: - 方法比较两个架构。The method compares two schemas. - 方法比较两个视图的架构。The method compares the schemas of two views. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将自定义数据源控件与多个其他小型自定义类结合使用，如下表所示。The following code example shows how to use a custom data source control with several other small custom classes, as listed in the following table. |自定义类Custom class|派生Derived from| |------------------|------------------| |`CustomDataSource`|| |`CustomDataSourceDesigner`|| |`CustomDataSourceView`|| |`CustomDesignDataSourceView`|| |`BookListViewSchema`|| |`CustomIDFieldSchema`|| |`CustomTitleFieldSchema`|| |`BookItem` (两个字段的数据结构。 ) `BookItem` (A two-field data structure.)|| 编译代码示例后，在设计视图中打开 .aspx 页面，然后将 `DataSourceID` 属性设置为自定义数据源控件的 ID。After compiling the code example, open the .aspx page in Design view and then set the `DataSourceID` property to the ID of the custom data source control. [!code-csharp[DataSourceDesignerSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataSourceDesignerSample/CS/DataSourceDesignerSample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataSourceDesignerSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataSourceDesignerSample/VB/DataSourceDesignerSample.vb#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[DataSourceDesignerSample#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataSourceDesignerSample/CS/DataSourceDesignerSample.aspx#6)] [!code-aspx-vb[DataSourceDesignerSample#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataSourceDesignerSample/VB/DataSourceDesignerSample.aspx#6)]

para.span: 若要在设计时为派生类中的 "操作列表" 菜单提供命令，您必须重写 属性以返回自定义 对象，该对象具有派生自对象的自定义项 。

span.span: To provide commands for the action list menu at design time in a derived class, you must override the property to return a custom object with custom items that are derived from the object.
Extending Design-Time Support

related.span: 如何：在设计模式下扩展控件的外观和行为

span.span: How to: Extend the Appearance and Behavior of Controls in Design Mode

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数在设计时由设计宿主调用。The constructor is called by the design host at design time.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property ActionLists As DesignerActionListCollection

summary.span: 获取项的列表，其中的项用来在设计时创建操作列表菜单。

span.span: Gets a list of items that are used to create an action list menu at design time.

value.span: 包含控件设计器的操作列表项的 对象。

span.span: A object containing the action list items for the control designer.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何使用控件和控件创建简单的复合控件 ，以及如何设置 `Text` 两个内部控件的属性以及 控件的和 属性 。The following code example demonstrates how to create a simple composite control with a control and a control, along with properties to set the `Text` properties on both internal controls, as well as the and properties of the control. 关联的控件设计器类创建三个 命令，每个命令都在控件上设置两个属性，其设置可在设计宿主中使用 undo 功能回滚。An associated control designer class creates three commands, each of which sets two properties on the control, and whose settings can be rolled back with the undo functionality in the design host. 尽管代码示例不使用自定义 对象，但它演示了如何重写 属性。Although the code example does not use a custom object, it illustrates how to override the property. [!code-csharp[DesignerInvokeTransactedChange#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DesignerInvokeTransactedChange/CS/InvokeTransactedChangeSample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DesignerInvokeTransactedChange#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DesignerInvokeTransactedChange/VB/InvokeTransactedChangeSample.vb#1)]

para.span: 当你创建派生自类的自定义类时 ，必须重写 属性。

span.span: When you create a custom class that is derived from the class, you must override the property.

para.span: 在重写方法中，首先调用基类以创建默认 对象，然后添加自定义的特定于您的类的操作列表。

span.span: In your override method, first call the base class to create the default object, and then add a custom list of actions that are specific to your class.
Extending Design-Time Support

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property CanConfigure As Boolean
public: virtual property bool CanConfigure { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示是否可以调用 方法。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the method can be called.

value.span: 如果可以调用 ，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if can be called; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 自定义类中的属性可以启用或禁用特定数据源的设计时配置。Use the property in a custom class to enable or disable design-time configuration for a specific data source. 设计宿主（如 Visual Studio 2005）使用 属性来确定配置数据源的命令是否在设计时显示在 "操作列表" 菜单中。A design host such as Visual Studio 2005 uses the property to determine whether a command to configure the data source appears in the action list menu at design time.

span.span: Extending Design-Time Support

related.span: 如何：在设计模式下扩展控件的外观和行为

span.span: How to: Extend the Appearance and Behavior of Controls in Design Mode

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property CanRefreshSchema As Boolean
public: virtual property bool CanRefreshSchema { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示是否可以调用 方法。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the method can be called.

value.span: 如果可以调用 ，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the can be called; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 派生类中的属性可以启用或禁用在设计时为特定数据源刷新架构的能力。Use the property in a derived class to enable or disable the ability to refresh the schema at design time for a specific data source. 如果您的应用程序需要固定的数据结构，并且架构将永远不会更改，则您希望 属性返回 `false` 。If your application requires an invariant data structure and the schema will never change, you want the property to return `false`. 设计宿主（如 Visual Studio 2005）使用 属性来确定用于刷新架构的命令是否在设计时显示在 "操作列表" 菜单中。A design host such as Visual Studio 2005 uses the property to determine whether a command to refresh the schema appears in the action list menu at design time. 在设计宿主（如 Visual Studio 2005）中，你可以 通过完成以下过程来查看操作中的属性：In a design host such as Visual Studio 2005, you can see the property in action by completing the following process: 1. 在页面上放置一个 或一个 控件。On your page, place a or an control. 2. 在设计视图的 "操作" 列表中，单击 " **配置**"。In Design view, on the action list, click **Configure**. 3. 从数据源中删除几个字段。Remove a few fields from the data source. 4. 在 "操作" 列表中，单击 " **刷新架构**"。On the action list, click **Refresh Schema**.

span.span: Extending Design-Time Support

related.span: 如何：在设计模式下扩展控件的外观和行为

summary.span: 启动设计宿主中的数据源配置实用工具。

span.span: Launches the data source configuration utility in the design host.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类不支持该方法 ; 但是，它可以由从类继承的自定义数据源设计器重写 。The method is not supported in the class; however, it can be overridden by custom data source designers inheriting from the class. 在设计宿主（如 Visual Studio 2005）中，可以 通过完成以下过程来查看操作中的方法：In a design host such as Visual Studio 2005, you can see the method in action by completing the following process: 1. 在页面上放置一个或一个 控件。Put a or an control on your page. 2. 在设计视图中，单击 "操作" 列表中的 " **配置**"。In Design view, on the action list, clicking **Configure**.

exception.span: 已尝试在基类中调用此方法。

span.span: An attempt was made to invoke this method in the base class.

summary.span: 当数据源的属性已更改且 值为 时，引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event when the properties of the data source have changed and the value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法通知绑定到关联数据源的每个控件的控件设计器，以便刷新其在设计宿主中的控件。The method notifies the control designers of each control that is bound to the associated data source to refresh its control in the design host. 方法可以与方法一起使用， 也可以通过使用的 参数调用方法 `false` 。The method can be suppressed with the method or by calling the method with an argument of `false`.

summary.span: 当数据源的架构已更改且 值为 时，引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event when the schema of the data source has changed and the value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法通知绑定到关联数据源的每个控件的控件设计器架构中的字段已更改。The method notifies the control designers of each control that is bound to the associated data source that the fields in the schema have changed. 可以通过 方法或通过调用 参数的属性来禁止方法 `false` 。The method can be suppressed with the method or by calling the property with an argument of `false`.

summary.span: 提供一个值，该值指示两个架构是否相等。

span.span: if both schemas are equivalent; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这两个架构的比较基于视图，以及视图中包含的字段的名称和类型。Comparison of the two schemas is based on the views, as well as the names and types of the fields that are contained in the views. 方法可以在没有类的实例的情况下使用 。The method can be used without an instance of the class.
